mapper.select: SELECT gtc.id AS tableConfigId, gtc.author AS author, gtc.package_name AS packageName, gtc.module_name AS moduleName, gt.table_comment AS tableComment, gt.object_name AS objectName, gt.business_name AS businessName, gt.function_name AS functionName FROM `gen_table` gt INNER JOIN `gen_table_config` gtc WHERE gt.id = #{tableId} AND gtc.id = #{tableConfigId}
